house.title: T0, Soho
house.body: Located in the heart of vibrant Soho, this fantastic studio apartment is beautifully presented and offers well proportioned living space with stylish interiors.

house.title: T0, London
house.body: These beautiful rooms are part of an exciting new UK hotel investment in the city of London. These hotel rooms offer individual investors an excellent opportunity to enter the lucrative hotel sector at an accessible level.

house.title: T0, London
house.body: A stunning two bedroom second floor apartment set in the Kidbrooke Village Development. Benefitting from on-site gym, concierge and access to Kidbrooke mainline station.

house.title: T1, London
house.address: Ingestre Court, Ingestre Place, London W1F
house.body: In the heart of Soho is this top floor, two bedroom apartment (510sq ft/47sq m) offering fantastic, far reaching views across the London skyline.

house.title: T1
house.address: Edwin Street, Canning Town, London, E16
house.body: This well proportioned 1 bedroom apartment offers open plan interiors filled with natural light. It showcases a neutral colour palette and a reception that leads onto a private balcony with room to relax.

house.title: T1
house.body: 1 bedroom 4th-floor apartment offering 48 sq.m of internal floor area with outdoor space. Contact a member of our sales team now to view our new show home.£100,000 for a 25% share of £400,000 and a deposit as low as £10,000 and a minimum income of £46,000.

house.title: T2, London
house.body: A one-bedroom apartment offered in excellent condition is situated on the first floor of a beautifully restored grade II listed Georgian building which retains many of its original architectural features. This meticulous designed flat benefits from high ceiling, private roof terrace and a long lease.

house.title: T2, London
house.body: Further benefits of the property include a very long lease, on-street residents permit parking, walking distance to a plethora of local amenities including bars, cafes, restaurants and shops and much more. This lovely home is also within easy reach of Tooting, Wimbledon and Earlsfield town centres as well as the beautiful open green spaces of Wimbledon Common and Richmond Park. Early viewings are highly recommended and can be accommodated seven days a week including Bank Holidays!

house.title: T2, London
house.body: This well-proportioned 2 bed apartment is set within an impressive building close to Twickenham Stadium. The interior offers charming finishes with windows that look out onto far-reaching views across London.

house.title: T3, Soho
house.body: A once in a lifetime opportunity to acquire this stunning Grade Two star listed freehold townhouse on one of the most desirable streets in Soho. This rare early 18th century street was initially developed by John Meard Junior, a Master Carpenter who worked on many great London churches, including St Paul's Cathedral, with Sir Christopher Wren.

house.title: T3, Harrow
house.body: Robertson Phillips are proud to welcome to the market a beautifully presented and spacious three double bedroom terraced property situated within the heart of West Harrow Village. Internally, the property is beautifully decorated, the current owner is constantly updating and upgrading the property and that is evident throughout. The property comprises lounge, study, guest cloakroom, kitchen diner, three good sized double bedrooms and family bathroom. The property further benefits from gas central heating, potential for expansion and a beautiful courtyard garden to the rear.

house.title: T3, Wimbledon
house.body: Further benefits of the property include a very long lease, on-street residents permit parking, walking distance to a plethora of local amenities including bars, cafes, restaurants and shops and much more. This lovely home is also within easy reach of Tooting, Wimbledon and Earlsfield town centres as well as the beautiful open green spaces of Wimbledon Common and Richmond Park. Early viewings are highly recommended and can be accommodated seven days a week including Bank Holidays!
